results.title: Charles Darwin
results.brief_description: “Summary: presents the discoveries, method of study, theories and personal philosophy of charles darwin. describes his observations on the galapagos finches which later figured in his conclusions on organic evolution. features professor richard eakin of the university of california in the role of the scientist”

results.title: The bioengineers
results.brief_description: SUMMARY: An exploration of the new combination of biology and engineering at Oak Ridge National Laboratory, with special emphasis on the investigation of human cells. The film also studies molecular biology and the control of disease

results.title: The Influential Americans
results.creator_credit: Arthur D Morse, Carousel Films and CBS
results.brief_description: A report on bold new experiments in the utilization of above-average teachers. Shows new teaching techniques and experiments. Intended to focus attention on the role of gifted school teachers and some of the methods currently used to solve major educational problems.

results.title: Greg Norman: the complete golfer. Part II: the short game
results.brief_description: Join ‘the Shark’ as he reveals his secrets of the short game; shots played from 75 yards in. Greg Norman goes through chipping, putting, playing from the sand bunker, all interspersed with prime, winning techniques from real tournament play.

results.title: Men who molest
results.brief_description: This program is an investigation of four men who have exhibited a range of molestation behaviour. Three of them are in treatment at the largest American community-based facility. The documentary examines the therapy that these men undergo in an attempt to control their behaviour and it emphasises the importance of therapy for this complex social problem.

results.title: The Great holiday massacre
results.brief_description: Survey of the causes and possible ‘Cures” of the gigantic traffic accident problem. Factors include high blood alcohol content; discourtesy; inexperience in younger drivers; disobedience of the law; carelessness; and speed. Illustrates these factors, explains self-inflicted deaths, and pin-points danger spots. Includes problems of convicting drunk drivers; improving care and road safety and suggests partial solutions.
